dmca.title: Fraud site - www.secure-deals.net
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 11:37 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Cc: ifcc33@ic3.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.secure-deals.net

 

It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.secure-deals.net
<http://www.secure-deals.net/>  

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.secure-deals.net
<http://www.secure-deals.net/>   which is infringing on Escrow.com's
intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com
(www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  They are claiming an
affiliation with our companies and have taken content from our site.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.secure-deals.net <http://www.secure-deals.net/>   site,
http://secure-deals.net/company.php  Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any
affiliation with www.secure-deals.net <http://www.secure-deals.net/>   and
has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 

 



 

Brandon W. Abbey

Managing Director

Escrow.com

16275 Laguna Canyon Road

Irvine, CA  92618

Direct - 949-790-5880

Fax - 949-790-5811
